title: About Face
description: Both Glory Bea Goode, who lives with her grandmother over a second-hand store in Turnback, Missouri, and Marvalene Zulig, who travels with her parents with Shuroffs' Spectacular Carnival, are unhappy with their lives until their friendship gives them a new perspective.Both Glory Bea Goode, who lives with her grandmother in Turnback, Missouri, and Marvalene Zulig, who travels with her parents with Shuroffs' Spectacular Carnival, are unhappy until their friendship gives them a new perspective.
author: June Rae Wood
